2 Set Motorhome Table Storage Kit, 18mm Thick Foldable Table Brackets for Camper Van Motorhome Accessories

Transform your camper van into a haven of organization with this versatile 2-Set Table Storage Kit. Designed specifically for motorhomes, caravans, and campers, these robust brackets offer a clever solution to maximize space and keep your essentials within reach.

Crafted from durable materials, each set includes two sturdy brackets that easily mount to the underside of your folding table. This creates an extra layer of storage beneath the surface, perfect for stowing away everyday items like utensils, cleaning supplies, or even small snacks.

  • 18mm Thick Construction: Ensures maximum stability and strength, supporting the weight of your stored belongings.
  • Folding Table Compatibility: Installs seamlessly on most folding table surfaces, adding functionality without compromising space.
  • Effortless Organization: Keep your campervan tidy and clutter-free with dedicated storage beneath your table.

Upgrade your camper van experience today. With this clever storage kit, you can enjoy a more organized and functional travel haven, wherever your adventures take you!

This RV motorhome campervan table storage kit provides a clever and space-saving solution for your mobile living needs. Featuring two sets of robust brackets, this kit enables you to securely mount folding tables within your campervan, freeing up valuable floor space when not in use.

  • Two Sets of Brackets: This kit includes enough brackets to install two separate folding tables, perfect for maximizing functionality and versatility.
  • 18mm Thick Mounting Plates:
  • Durable Construction: Built from high-quality materials, these brackets are designed to withstand the rigors of everyday use on the road.

This RV table storage kit boasts a design that is both functional and compact.

  • Each Set Includes Two Brackets for a Secure Mount
  • 18mm Thick Mounting Plates: Ensure strong and stable support for your folding tables.

Experience the convenience of organized storage and reclaimed floor space in your campervan with this table storage kit.

  • Enhanced Storage Efficiency: Create a clutter-free environment by securely storing folding tables when not in use.
  • Maximized Floor Space: Free up valuable square footage within your campervan, allowing for more comfortable living and movement.
  • Convenient Table Access: Quickly deploy your tables whenever needed, offering ample surface area for dining, working, or playing games.

This RV table storage kit is designed to seamlessly integrate with various types of folding tables commonly found in campervans. Follow these simple steps for installation:

  1. Identify the desired location for your tables within your campervan.
  2. Securely mount the brackets to the wall or designated area using appropriate screws and hardware (not included).
  3. Install the folding tables onto the mounted brackets, ensuring they are securely fastened.
